one_reviews_text:
A nice and uncomplicated setting for killing monsters. The only problem I have is that I constantly press the Oculus menu button during fights. When hacking through the hordes I often touch the button, and then the game is over.

I don't know if it's a problem with my technique or these kind of games in general. You do not really fight the enemies, but waving your hands in the air. And when doing this waving movement, my thumb hits the button.

*** If you like Nazi Zombies and exotic weapons, BUY THIS GAME!!! ***
This game is still very much an early access experience; however, it has the potential to be something very awesome. The core of the game feels like a Call of Duty Zombies experience, but the atmosphere, enemies, and unique exotic weapons make it stand out from the typical repetitive gun-shooting experience that so many other VR games have. There is truly no other VR game like this on the market. I am really looking forward to seeing this game improve.

We plan on doing another big update in the near future, to briefly summarize, the update will include a tutorial, new weapons and abilities, updated player hands, plus making the rest of the map accessible. Some polish and bug fixes will also come during that time. Figured I’d also mention we’re in the process of making the game cross platform ready. If you’d be interested in hearing more then please check out our public Discord and Facebook page. Links to both are in our description, we hope to see you there!

one_reviews_text: Pretty solid experience overall, trailer i think was a bit outdated though. The weapon models and such must've been updated since they did that video as they look way better then the stuff shown. The weapon handling is this game is really solid too, bow handling especially is some of the best i've seen in any vr game thus far. Overall i got a real call of duty zombies feel to this game more over then any other vr game i've played so far with wave based mechanics, which is a big selling point for me since that's always been one of my favorite game modes.
